Name: SamuraiZero
About the game: Samurai Zero-Go on a great journey through various regions of ancient Japan, pass the most difficult tests on your way, which change from level to level, tests that will make you spend more than one hour in the hope of a victorious outcome. Samurai Zero is a Platformer with various mechanics of passing, from runner to slasher, from training your attentiveness to concentrated reaction, all this is seasoned with the old-school effect of old TVs, creating a unique atmosphere and mood. Feature of game: - Hardcore - Beautiful Pixel Art - Retro TV style - Variety of mechanics
